title: The Legend of Zelda - Breath of the Wild (PC Cemu 1.7.5 + Fixes)
description:
The Legend of Zelda - Breath of the Wild (PC Cemu 1.7.5 + Fixes)
[TheSNKNeoGeo Repack]



UPDATED 5/8/2017

new rules and .ini configurations.
Cemu updated to latest version.

How to Play :

1 - Enter on "cemu" folder and create a shortcut for Cemu.exe
2 - Right click on created Shortcut, choose "Properties" on "Target" field you see something like this "YOUR DRIVE LETTER:YOUR PC FOLDERThe Legend of Zelda - Breath of the WildcemuCemu.exe"
3 - Now after "YOUR PC FOLDER ADRESSThe Legend of Zelda - Breath of the WildcemuCemu.exe" add -g ..game�0050000101C9500codeU-King.rpx (Attention to the space after ")

The Final results looks this :

"YOUR DRIVE LETTER:YOUR PC FOLDERThe Legend of Zelda - Breath of the WildcemuCemu.exe" -g ..game�0050000101C9500codeU-King.rpx

Now your shortcut opens THE LEGEND OF ZELDA: BREATH OF THE WILD directly, like a PC game ! and you can add on Nvidia Geforce Experience for Streaming for example !
